find_package(Git QUIET)

if(NOT ${quant3d_SUBMODULES_MANUAL})
    if(GIT_FOUND AND EXISTS "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/.git")
        git_update_submodules("${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")
    else()
        message(WARNING "quant3d_SUBMODULES_MANUAL is on, but this is not a git repository")
    endif()
endif()

if(NOT EXISTS "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/extern/MC3D/CMakeLists.txt")
    if (${quant3d_STANDALONE})
        message(FATAL_ERROR "The submodules were not downloaded! Please update submodules and try again.")
    else()
        message(WARNING "quant3d submodules not downloaded! Must supply them in a base project.")
    endif()
endif()
